titles.title: MILC Preservation Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to preserve certain rates for the milk income loss contract program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 3/2/2011--Introduced. MILC Preservation Act of 2011 - Amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 regarding the milk income loss contract program to: (1) make the current producer payment formula permanent, and (2) revise the payment rate adjustment for feed prices by deleting the subsequent adjustment authority provision.
